The workshop consisted of an introduction to the topic, easy wins, hands-on exercises on creating reproducible manuscripts in Quarto, and an outlook to advanced topics like version control and containerization. Slides and exercises are in German. The workshop materials are licensed under a [CC BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license. The preview image is taken from [The Turing Way](https://zenodo.org/doi/10.5281/zenodo.3332807).
